meanings.sent1: The painting remained unmarred by any scratches or marks.
meanings.sent2: The fresh snow on the ground was unmarred by footprints.
meanings.sent3: The cake was unmarred until the mischievous cat decided to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: Her unmarred reputation shone brightly in the eyes of the community.
meanings.sent5: The unmarred beauty of the untouched landscape took his breath away.

meanings.sent1: The mirror reflected her unmarred complexion flawlessly.
meanings.sent2: The crystal-clear lake was unmarred by any pollution.
meanings.sent3: The unmarred apple looked almost too perfect to eat.
meanings.sent4: His unmarred record of success was unmatched in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The unmarred diamond sparkled with pure brilliance under the light.
